title: Mr. Big
description: Maxwell Smart must stop Mr. Big from blowing up the Statue of Liberty with his new inthermo ray. Max's team includes Agent K9 Fang and his new partner the beautiful Agent 99.

title: Diplomat's Daughter
description: While protecting a diplomat's daughter, Smart tangles with the KAOS agent The Claw.

title: School Days
description: 86 and 99 go undercover at the CONTROL spy school to find a KAOS agent.

roles.char: Control Trainee Disguised as Little Old Lady

title: Our Man in Toyland
description: 99 discovers that KAOS is shipping secrets out of the country in talking dolls.

title: Now You See Him, Now You Don't
description: A doctor comes to Max's apartment and insists that he has an invisibility ray.

title: Washington 4, Indians 3
description: American Indians insist that they get back all their land or they will attack with missiles.

title: KAOS in CONTROL
description: At a conference of some the the most brilliant men on the planet, KAOS plans to hit them with a regression gun.

title: The Day Smart Turned Chicken
description: Because Smart has is a witness at a trial, KAOS is trying to prove that he is crazy.

title: Satan Place
description: The Chief is kidnapped and will undergo mind control surgery. Max poses as his doctor.

title: Our Man in Leotards
description: A new drug is stolen from CONTROL to be used against the Ambassador of Pinerovia.

title: Too Many Chiefs
description: A master of disguise pretends to be the Chief to get near and kill a KAOS defector.

title: My Nephew the Spy
description: Max's Aunt and Uncle help stop a KAOS communication center disguised as a shoe store.

title: Aboard the Orient Express
description: Max and 99 try to solve the mystery of the deaths of CONTROL couriers while riding the Orient Express.

title: Weekend Vampire
description: CONTROL agents wind up dead with marks that look like vampire bites.

title: Survival of the Fattest
description: Max must protect an Arab prince who must keep eating to gain weight.

title: Double Agent
description: Max becomes a drunken jobless bum so that KAOS will recruit him.

title: Kisses for KAOS
description: Buildings are being blown up in Washington by paintings that include explosives.

title: The Dead Spy Scrawls
description: KAOS is using a pool hall as its communications center.

title: Back to the Old Drawing Board
description: Hymie is introduced to CONTROL as KAOS tries to kidnap a CONTROL scientist.

title: All in the Mind
description: As a crazy Army officer, Max tries to prove that a psychiatrist is passing on confidential information to KAOS.

title: Dear Diary
description: CONTROL must track down the secret journal of a retired secret agent.

title: Smart the Assassin
description: Smart is hypnotized to kill the Chief during their nightly game of chess.

title: I'm Only Human
description: Max and Fang investigate an animal spa where other agents' dogs killed them after visiting it.

title: Stakeout on Blue Mist Mountain
description: KAOS agents from all over are each carrying one piece of a bomb that is going to be used against a government base. Max has to disarm it.

title: The Amazing Harry Hoo
description: Hawaiian detective Harry Hoo and Max track his old nemesis The Claw to a San Francisco laundry.

title: Hubert's Unfinished Symphony
description: As music critics Max and the Chief enter the world of symphonic music and must save a contact from an exploding piano.

title: Ship of Spies: Part 1
description: Max is working undercover on a ship trying to find the plans of a super-secret weapon.

title: Ship of Spies: Part 2
description: Max is working undercover on a ship trying to find the plans of a super-secret weapon.

title: Shipment to Beirut
description: Max must retrieve some secret plans that are sewn into a dress according to a model.

title: The Last One in Is a Rotten Spy
description: Max must retrieve something from a member of the Russian women's swim team, but can't remember her name.

title: Anatomy of a Lover
description: KAOS uses Hymie as a robotic assassin against the Chief.

title: Strike While the Agent Is Hot
description: Max inherits the position of union negotiator between agents and CONTROL.

title: A Spy for a Spy
description: Both sides are kidnapping agents at such a rate that almost no one is left on either side.

title: The Only Way to Die
description: Max is listed as dead so he can complete a mission.

title: Maxwell Smart, Alias Jimmy Ballantine
description: Inept Max poses as a safe cracker so the Chief orders all federal bank vaults left open.

title: Casablanca
description: Even after he is ordered to go on vacation Max follows the Choker to Casablanca.

title: The Decoy
description: KAOS is lead to believe that Max is carrying a secret code.

title: Hoo Done It
description: At an island paradise hotel 86 and Harry Hoo solve a murder mystery.

title: Rub-A-Dub-Dub... Three Spies in a Sub
description: Max and 99 end up on a KAOS sub commanded by Siegfried.

title: The Greatest Spy on Earth
description: CONTROL sends 86 and 99 into a circus to look for a smuggling operation.

title: Island of the Darned
description: The CONTROL agents are trapped on a KAOS island.

title: Bronzefinger
description: Max enters the world of art looking for an art thief know as Bronzefinger.

title: Perils in a Pet Shop
description: KAOS is using parrots to learn secret formulas and then KAOS smuggles them out of the country.

title: The Whole Tooth and...
description: After Max hides some secret plans, he has to go into a jail to retrieve them.

title: Kiss of Death
description: The deadliest of the species. A woman pretends to love Max so she can kill him.

title: It Takes One to Know One
description: After every number two man at CONTROL is killed Hymie becomes number two.

title: Someone Down Here Hates Me
description: KAOS puts up a reward for anyone who can "Get Smart!"

title: Cutback at Control
description: Some CONTROL agents start to work for KAOS after cutbacks.

title: The Mummy
description: Using mummy cases, KAOS is smuggling agents into the United States.

title: The Girls from KAOS
description: Max is assigned to protect the winner of the Miss USA contest.

title: The Man from YENTA
description: An Arabian prince is protected by Max and an Israeli agent.

title: Smart Fit the Battle of Jericho
description: Max is investigating a madman who is blowing up high-rise buildings though CONTROL is not sure how he is doing it.

title: Where-What-How-Who Am I?
description: Agent 86 has amnesia after he hears about a KAOS plot.

title: The Expendable Agent
description: A British scientist is hiding at Max's apartment.

title: How to Succeed in the Spy Business Without Really Trying
description: Max's archenemy Siegfried wants to defect.

title: Appointment in Sahara
description: KAOS tries to blackmail the world when they get an atomic bomb.

title: Pussycats Galore
description: Max and 99 go deep undercover when American scientists start disappearing.

title: A Man Called Smart: Part 1
description: KAOS threatens the USA to dry up its entire water supply. CONTROL is temporarily taken over by its original chief Admiral Hardgrade.

roles.char: Woman at the Hotel and Control Bank

title: A Man Called Smart: Part 2
description: KAOS threatens the USA to dry up its entire water supply. CONTROL is temporarily taken over by its original chief Admiral Hardgrade.

title: A Man Called Smart: Part 3
description: KAOS threatens the USA to dry up its entire water supply. CONTROL is temporarily taken over by its original chief Admiral Hardgrade.

title: The Spy Who Met Himself
description: KAOS impersonators are running around causing chaos in CONTROL.

title: Viva Smart
description: Max and 99 go to a South American country dressed as flamenco dancers to save the President of the country.

title: Witness for the Persecution
description: KAOS is going to stop Smart from testifying against one of their agents.

title: The Spirit Is Willing
description: Max must hold a sance to get information from a dead informer.

title: Maxwell Smart, Private Eye
description: Max is moonlighting as a private investigator when cutbacks hit CONTROL.

title: Supersonic Boom
description: KAOS can send out sonic booms at will and threatens New York City with one.

title: One of Our Olives Is Missing
description: A country singer accidentally swallows an olive with a transmitter in it and Max must protect her from KAOS.

title: When Good Fellows Get Together
description: KAOS has developed another robot that goes up against Hymie.

title: Dr. Yes
description: Max and 99 are looking for the man that is sabotaging missile launches.

title: That Old Gang of Mine
description: Max is going to London to do some undercover work.

title: The Mild Ones
description: Max and 99 join a motorcycle gang to save a kidnapped Prime Minister.

title: Classification: Dead
description: Max must find an antidote after he his poisoned by a KAOS agent.

title: The Mysterious Dr. T
description: After the death of the head CONTROL scientist, Max finds that he wasn't the brains behind his discoveries.

title: The King Lives?
description: Max temporarily takes over for a king that looks exactly like him in a parody of The Prisoner of Zenda. "Ah yes, I remember the well."

roles.char: King Charles IX King of Coronia

title: The Groovy Guru
description: When teenagers are turning into zombies, Max and 99 go after their idol the Groovy Guru.

title: The Little Black Book: Part 1
description: Thinking that a list of KAOS agents is Max's little black book, Max and his old Army buddy get dates with a couple of KAOS agents.

title: The Little Black Book: Part 2
description: Now knowing that Max is a spy, Max and his Army buddy go up against the KAOS agent know as the Maestro.

title: Don't Look Back
description: Max ends up as a "Fugitive" after he is convicted of robbing a bank and killing a man. On his way to the death house he sees the one-hand man and escapes to find him.

title: 99 Loses Control
description: With no apparent future at CONTROL, 99 accepts a marriage proposal from a handsome wealthy suitor. Max follows her, gets offered a job and finds out that he is a KAOS agent.

title: The Wax Max
description: Even during a day off at an amusement park, 86 and 99 find a KAOS operation.

title: Operation Ridiculous
description: While Max and 99 host a writer who is doing a story on CONTROL for a national news magazine, his assistant is a KAOS agent intent on making them look like fools.

title: Spy, Spy, Birdie
description: A man who only wants quiet in the world invents a silent explosive.

title: Run, Robot, Run
description: When US athletes are injured Hymie turns into a one man track team to help the US win.

title: The Hot Line
description: A KAOS operative, imitating the President, calls the Chief. He orders the Chief to step down and gives the Chief's job to Max. KAOS also infiltrates CONTROL by planting their man, Brady, to CONTROL.

title: Die, Spy
description: Max gets a hip black partner as he and 99 tour the world as a ping-pong pro in this spoof of 'I Spy.'

title: The Reluctant Redhead
description: CONTROL tries to get some KAOS files with the help of a non-professional spy.

title: The Impossible Mission
description: While trapped in a television station in a seemingly impossible situation Max admits that he would like to have spent the rest of his life with the smitten 99 which she takes as a proposal.

title: Snoopy Smart vs. the Red Baron
description: While visiting 99's mother (who also doesn't seem to have a name) they run into Siegfried who is destroying America's potato crop. Max goes after him in a parody of Snoopy and the Red Baron.

title: Closely Watched Planes
description: CONTROL couriers are disappearing on airliners. Max is assigned as the next courier and has to solve the mystery or die.

title: The Secret of Sam Vittorio
description: Max and 99 portray look alike ex-cons Connie and Floyd (Bonnie and Clyde!) to find out where their mentor hid all his stolen loot.

title: Diamonds Are a Spy's Best Friend
description: To keep a priceless diamond out of KAOS's hands, a jeweler sells it to 86 for an engagement ring for 99.

title: The Worst Best Man
description: Every time Max chooses a best man at CONTROL, the agent is murdered so then Max chooses Hymie.

title: A Tale of Two Tails
description: While working at the CONTROL spy school Max has two students trail 99 thinking that she is running errands. She is actually on assignment and she thinks that they are KAOS agents.

title: The Return of the Ancient Mariner
description: With an attempt to kidnap Admiral Hardgrade in the works, Max has him stay in his apartment.

title: With Love and Twitches
description: On 86 and 99's wedding day Max breaks out in a rash, but not due to cold feet. He was given a tonic by a fugitive doctor that will cause his chest to break out in a map.

title: The Laser Blazer
description: Max is sent to Hong Kong to pick up a secret weapon and all they give him is a blazer. This blazer is special since it contains a laser and Max doesn't know it.

title: The Farkas Fracas
description: The Smarts' neighbors give 99 a dessert designed to poison the Chief so they can steal his briefcase.

title: Temporarily Out of CONTROL
description: Max is temporarily called back into the Navy and he is the Chief's superior officer. They have to get back to CONTROL and are sent to the brig.

title: Schwartz's Island
description: On their honeymoon 86 and 99 become marooned on a deserted island and find Siegfried and Starker on their synthetic island.

title: One Nation Invisible
description: A scientist who shows up at Max's apartment invisible. When she finally appears she is a beautiful woman that 99 catches Max with.

title: Hurray for Hollywood
description: 86 and 99 get jobs as actors to find out how KAOS is passing information.

title: The Day They Raided the Knights
description: When budget cuts hit CONTROL, 99 is on the list of agents to be laid off. She then finds a temporary job at a trading stamp redemption center, which also happens to be a KAOS munitions drop that is about to begin distribution of their latest weapon, a stereophonic pistol. 99 finds out what is going on and informs the Chief, but is captured before she can give the location. The Chief and Larabee eventually find the location, but are captured themselves. It is now up to Max to find and save them.

title: Tequila Mockingbird
description: Max and 99 travel to Mexico to find the Tequila Mockingbird after another CONTROL agent is killed trying to deliver it to CONTROL.

title: I Shot 86 Today
description: Missiles are being blown up near golf courses so Max is following around a golf pro that was near each incident.

title: Absorb the Greek
description: When the Chief takes up with a young woman, Max follows him and finds out that she is the wife of a scientist and the Chief is memorizing her husband's formulas.

title: To Sire, with Love: Part 1
description: The King of Caronia, Max's double, is in Washington staying with the Smarts. Even his wife 99 can't tell them apart.

title: To Sire, with Love: Part 2
description: The King of Caronia, Max's double, is in Washington staying with the Smarts. Even his wife 99 can't tell them apart.

title: Shock It to Me
description: Electronic equipment shipments by truck are being stolen by those who are listed as deceased. Can KAOS bring back its agents for an encore performance?

title: Leadside
description: Leadside a wheelchair bound mastermind swears to destroy CONTROL and kill 86. Think Ironside.

title: Greer Window
description: Stuck at home due to an injury Max spies on a neighboring building and sees secret documents disappearing. The Chief sends in 99 with Max watching.

title: The Not-So-Great Escape: Part 1
description: Agents are disappearing at the airport and that includes the Chief. Max trails them to a KAOS POW camp in New Jersey. Max infiltrates the camp, but is caught.

title: The Not-So-Great Escape: Part 2
description: CONTROL agents tunnel out of the KAOS POW camp ala "The Great Escape."

title: Pheasant Under Glass
description: After 99 tells Max that she is expecting a baby, Max tells a newspaperman that he is a spy and he blows his cover.

title: Ironhand
description: Head of KAOS Ironhand wants to steal the anti-anti missile plans that 99 is transporting in a baby buggy.

title: Valerie of the Dolls
description: KAOS is smuggling a formula out in a doll that Max accidentally picks up in his class for expectant fathers.

title: Widow Often Annie
description: Still married to a pregnant and showing 99, Max is ordered to marry the Black Widow who has killed other CONTROL agents on their wedding nights.

title: The Treasure of C. Errol Madre
description: After the payroll is stolen Max must get a map to a gold mine so they can get the money needed to start up CONTROL again.

title: Smart Fell on Alabama
description: Smart trains some convicts so they can break into a mansion and steal a codebook.

title: And Baby Makes Four: Part 1
description: Max gets his hospital map mixed up with a KAOS agent's map, Simon the Likeable, and ends up at a KAOS hospital while 99 is in labor.

title: And Baby Makes Four: Part 2
description: Max and 99 escape KAOS headquarters, get to their own hospital, have boy and girl twins and catch Simon the Likeable with the help of 99's mother.

title: Physician Impossible
description: While visiting 99 and the twins and wearing a doctor's gown, Max is kidnapped to work by the very prisoner who had escaped after being shot by him earlier in the day.

title: The Apes of Rath
description: Agents are receiving bananas and being murdered. Max receives one and is being protected by Agent Armstong an ape that was surgically changed to look like a human.

title: Age Before Duty
description: Everyone in CONTROL is aging rapidly and Max and 99 must find out why before they die of old age.

title: Is This Trip Necessary?
description: Everybody in CONTROL is suffering from bad dreams. Max and 99 have to investigate KAOS's operations at the Dartfoot Spring Water Company.

title: Ice Station Siegfried
description: 99 and C.I.A. agent Quigley go to the North Pole when the entire world is undergoing a new Ice Age. They find Siegfried and a very large fan cooling off the planet.

title: Moonlighting Becomes You
description: Max and 99 join a radio show that is really a KAOS communications front. The Chief is worried that Max's characteristics are rubbing off on 99 since they now live together.

title: House of Max: Part 1
description: Max and 99 are in London to investigate the reappearance of Jack the Ripper. The owner of Duval's Cave of Wax has developed a formula to bring his wax characters to life.

title: House of Max: Part 2
description: Max and 99 are in London to investigate the reappearance of Jack the Ripper. The owner of Duval's Cave of Wax has developed a formula to bring his wax characters to life.

title: Rebecca of Funny-Folk Farm
description: While retrieving a package from the Van Hooten mansion, 99's resemblance to the owner's dead sister throws a monkey wrench into the mission.

title: The Mess of Adrian Listenger
description: Every player on the CONTROL baseball team are dead except Max and the Chief and they suspect each other.

title: Witness for the Execution
description: Max must guard a KAOS defector in his apartment until he can testify at trial. In the meantime KAOS sends "the Exterminator" to silence the witness.

title: How Green Was My Valet
description: At the Bulmanian Embassy Max and 99 go undercover as servants to recover a missing rocket formula.

title: And Only Two Ninety-Nine
description: KAOS kidnaps Mrs. Smart (99) and replaces her with an exact duplicate that is feeding Max poison bit by bit.

title: Smartacus
description: KAOS is using a steam bath laced with a truth serum to obtain secret information. Max and the Chief investigate the baths while also being completely honest about how they feel about each other.

title: What's It All About, Algie?
description: Algie's Nursery is using plants to spy on people in Washington.

title: Hello, Columbus - Goodbye, America
description: Gino is Christopher Columbus's direct descendant and legally owns the Americas. Max has to keep him out of KAOS's hands until he hands over the land rights to the President.

title: Do I Hear a Vaults?
description: While securing a book with all of CONTROL's employees listed in it in a vault, Max locks the Chief and Larabee in it and they are running out of air.

title: I Am Curiously Yellow
description: The Whip hypnotizes Max who steals the NARCO 5-12 for him.
